name: Gobbo's Gambit
description:
Gobbo's Gambit is a stealth action game about a sentient NPC that decides he no longer wants to perform his minion duties. He must think with his mind as he navigates the treacherous dungeon he once guarded.

Jump, climb, crawl, push and knock enemies unconscious in this fantasy dungeon extravaganza! Players must meticulously outsmart their foes, or succumb to their brute force power. Can you escape the dungeon?

This game includes:

-Beautiful 3D Fantasy dungeons
-Fully immersive character animation
-Strategic stealth gameplay
-2 full levels of awesomeness!
